title: ALL SOLD: T206 Polar Bears, including Cy, Chase, Doyle
author: Rob D.

posts.post_title: ALL SOLD: T206 Polar Bears, including Cy, Chase, Doyle
posts.post_content:
Recently was able to upgrade some cards in my Polar Bear subset. I can't post scans of the backs right now, but they are all clean. Will post back scans later this evening. Sorry for the out-of-proportion scans.

All have Polar Bear backs:

Doc Adkins, unslabbed: $xx
Neal Ball, unslabbed: $x
Jack Bliss, unslabbed: $x
Hal Chase trophy, unslabbed, $xx
Joe Doyle throwing, PSA 3, $xxx
Ted Easterly, not slabbed, $xx
Rube Manning, not slabbed, $x
Bud Sharpe, not slabbed, $xx
Cy Young (back residue), not slabbed, $xxx

All prices delivered within the United States.

PayPal is fine. No need to "gift" your payment. Checks, money orders and cash are OK, too.

A commitment to buy takes precedence over an ongoing negotiation. :rolleyes:

[URL="wolfie5sb@aol.com"]Feel free to email any questions.[/URL]

Thanks,

Rob

[URL="wolfie5sb@aol.com"]wolfie51sb at aol.com[/URL]

[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/ineedanap/t206polarbears/newadkins.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/ineedanap/t206polarbears/polar-neal-ball-throw.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/ineedanap/t206polarbears/bliss-pb_1.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/ineedanap/t206polarbears/chase-trophy.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/ineedanap/t206polarbears/joe-doyle-throw-pb.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/ineedanap/t206polarbears/easterly-pb-upgrade.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/ineedanap/t206polarbears/manning-pb.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/ineedanap/t206polarbears/sharpepb.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/ineedanap/t206polarbears/newyoung.jpg[/IMG]

Never mind.
Missed the boat apparently.
Dammit.
Nice cards, even better prices.

All have been sold to a single buyer. 

Thanks, Rob
